content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Max. I want to rent out this apartment for 800 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a bit low for me, Max. I'm looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I can increase the price to 850 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Still too low, Max. I think the apartment is worth more than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm getting closer to my price, Max. But I think the apartment is worth more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your offer, but I think the apartment is worth more. I'm looking for a price that truly reflects its value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can see that you are a smart and responsible person, Max. So, I can offer you a price of 1000 euros, which I think is a fair price for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already agreed on the price.

TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
